data_table.description: Fasting/Tracking Form, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: FTRA02A
variable.description: [Fasting information]. When was the last time you ate or drank anything except water? Day last ate or drank. Q2a [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 1]

variable.name: FTRA03
variable.description: [Fasting information]. Computed fasting time. Q3 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 1]

variable.name: FTRA24
variable.description: [Participant information]. How many people live in your household? Q24 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 1]

variable.name: FTRA25
variable.description: [Participant information]. How many of them are between ages of 45 and 64? Q25 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 1]

variable.name: FTRA26
variable.description: [Participant information]. State of birth. Q26 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 1]

variable.name: FTRA32
variable.description: [Participant information]. State of driver's license. Q32 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 1]

variable.name: FTRA33
variable.description: [Physician information]. Do you have a personal physician or clinic? Q33 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 1]

variable.name: FTRA42
variable.description: [Notification of test results]. Show and explain results reporting sheet. Q42 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 1]
variable.value: Detailed results to both participant and physician
Detailed results to participant, but no to physician
Usual procedure (detailed results to physician, summary to participant)

variable.name: FTRA43
variable.description: [Notification of test results]. Are you currently participating in any other medical research projects? Q43 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 1]

variable.name: FTRA01HM
variable.description: [Fasting information]. Time of day [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 1]

variable.name: FTRA02HM
variable.description: [Fasting information]. When was the last time you ate or drank anything except water? Time of last food or drink consumption [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 1]
